text: Mohammad Mokhber Dezfuli () (born 26 June 1955) is an Iranian politician who served as the acting President of Iran from 19 May 2024 until 28 July 2024, following the death of President Ebrahim Raisi. He was also the 7th and current first vice president of Iran from 8 August 2021 until 28 July 2024. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Iran Category:Presidents of Iran
title: Mohammad Mokhber
